revision.text:
'''Johto''' is the second [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi. [[File:Johto_V0.9.11.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Johto region]] ===Towns and [[Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azelea Town]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Indigo Plateau Johto]] |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
